version_description:
- New doctors & managers will improve the hospital's performance!
- The game is now translated into Vietnamese, Indonesian, Spanish, Italian, Chinese, Korean, Malay, German, Polish, Portuguese, Thai, Turkish, French, Japanese.
- You can restore purchases

- New doctors & managers will improve the hospital's performance!
- The game is now translated into Vietnamese, Indonesian, Spanish, Italian, Chinese, Korean, Malay, German, Polish, Portuguese, Thai, Turkish, French, Japanese.
- You can restore purchases

- 新醫生與經理將會提升醫院的效率！
- 遊戲現在支援越南文、印尼文、西班牙文、義大利文、中文、韓文、馬來文、德文、波蘭文、葡萄牙文、泰文、土耳其文、法文、日文。
- 你可以恢復購買
- 在此版本中，我們修復了一些錯誤並優化了一些效能。而且我們的英雄們現在有配音了！
